long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension makes it easy to use Menlo Security's web isolation solution.

It automatically changes links (`a.href`) on webpages to addresses through the web isolation solution, and allows users to register URL patterns that they don't want automatically changed.

You can also use the context menu to do the same.


* Note: This chrome extension is made by an individual developer who has no direct relationship with "Menlo Security".

* Note 2: The source code of this program is published on GitHub.
(https://github.com/sh-cho/open-via-menlo)
